item.title: ::vote command
item.dc:creator: @YuraK YuraK
item.description:
@YuraK wrote:

Oke, i made a vote command probely it looks good.
But i have a webclient (a free 1 on rswebs)
Since its also client bounded, i wonder if there is any way to make it work
if they donâ€™t have the client.
This is my command

} if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("vote") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("vote4cash")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("http://www.runelocus.com/toplist/details-27473-heroicscape.html", 12000); c.sendMessage("Vote evry 12 hwrs please"); }
Well i have no idea what to do, i tried this as well
if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("vote") || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("vote4cash")) { launchURL("http://www.runelocus.com/toplist/details-27473-heroicscape.html", 12000); c.sendMessage("Vote evry 12 hwrs please"); }
But seems like he doesn't accept that eather i got compileing errors that way so if anyone knows, it would be realy helpfull thank u.
